entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 41 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
